author: Greg Ip
title: U.S. Fiscal Future Won’t Be Like Its Carefree Past
text:
If you think the federal debt is bad, the bigger picture is worse.

A recent report from Moody’s Investors Service shows why. Moody’s is to governments what Experian is to individuals: a monitor of creditworthiness. The U.S., Moody’s report shows, is blessed with extraordinary advantages when it comes to borrowing. Yet it is about to experience a dramatic loss of financial freedom because it is shrinking its tax base just as interest expenses surge and social programs get harder to cut. It is like someone who borrows freely... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
